statements: SELECT * FROM insurers_fraud_detection;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE policy_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE claim_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, customer_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, customer_id, claim_amount FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE policy_id = 12345 AND claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM insurers_fraud_detection GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_claims > 3 ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurers_fraud_detection GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurers_fraud_detection WHERE customer_id IN (56789, 67890, 78901) ORDER BY claim_date ASC, claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT policy_id, date_claimed, amount FROM claims WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_claimed DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, amount FROM claims WHERE date_claimed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT claim_id, amount, policy_id FROM claims WHERE amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM insurers;
SELECT insurer_name, location FROM insurers WHERE insurer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT insurer_name, claim_amount FROM insurers JOIN claims ON insurers.insurer_id = claims.insurer_id WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT claim_id, reason FROM outliers WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM insurers;
SELECT insurer_name, location FROM insurers WHERE insurer_id = 1;
SELECT claims.claim_id, claims.claim_date, insurers.insurer_name FROM claims JOIN insurers ON claims.insurer_id = insurers.insurer_id;
SELECT claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claims.claim_id, outliers.reason, insurers.insurer_name FROM claims JOIN outliers ON claims.claim_id = outliers.claim_id JOIN insurers ON claims.insurer_id = insurers.insurer_id;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_age DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT claim_status, claim_notes FROM claim_details WHERE claim_review_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE policy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_age FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_age > 30 ORDER BY policyholder_age DESC;
SELECT claim_id, fraud_type, fraud_status FROM fraud_attempts WHERE fraud_status = true;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_notes FROM claim_details ORDER BY claim_review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='Active';
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address FROM policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT insurer_name, insurer_phone FROM insurers WHERE insurer_email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date, premium_amount FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount, claim_date, claim_status FROM claims JOIN policyholders ON claims.policy_number = policyholders.policyholder_id WHERE policyholder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT insurer_name, count(*) AS total_claims FROM claims JOIN insurers ON claims.policy_number = insurers.insurer_id GROUP BY insurer_name HAVING total_claims > 5 ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id IN (SELECT policy_number FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000);
SELECT claim_id, detection_type, detection_date, fraud_level FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_level = 'High' AND detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
